mapper.select: SELECT B.* FROM (SELECT A.*, ROWNUM AS RNUM FROM (SELECT * FROM AUCTION INNER JOIN STOCK ON AUCTION.stock_no = STOCK.stock_no WHERE auc_status=2 ORDER BY auc_regDate DESC) A) B WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{startseq } AND #{endseq }
SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM AUCTION INNER JOIN STOCK ON AUCTION.stock_no = STOCK.stock_no ORDER BY auc_join DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <= 4
SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTALPAGE FROM AUCTION INNER JOIN STOCK ON AUCTION.stock_no = STOCK.stock_no WHERE auc_status=2

SELECT B.* FROM (SELECT A.*, ROWNUM AS RNUM FROM (SELECT * FROM AUCTION INNER JOIN STOCK ON AUCTION.stock_no = STOCK.stock_no WHERE stock_location = #{stock_location } AND auc_status=2 ORDER BY auc_regDate DESC) A) B WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{startseq} AND #{endseq}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTALPAGE FROM AUCTION INNER JOIN STOCK ON AUCTION.stock_no = STOCK.stock_no WHERE stock_location = #{zoneval } AND auc_status=2

SELECT B.* FROM (SELECT A.*, ROWNUM AS RNUM FROM (SELECT * FROM AUCTION INNER JOIN STOCK ON AUCTION.stock_no = STOCK.stock_no WHERE stock_kind = #{stock_kind } AND auc_status=2 ORDER BY auc_regDate DESC) A) B WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{startseq} AND #{endseq}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM AUCTION INNER JOIN STOCK ON AUCTION.stock_no = STOCK.stock_no WHERE auc_no = #{auc_no})

SELECT TRUNC(EndDate - StartDate) as "day", TRUNC(((EndDate - StartDate) - TRUNC(EndDate - StartDate)) * 24) as "hours", FLOOR(((((EndDate - StartDate) -TRUNC(EndDate - StartDate)) * 24) - TRUNC(((EndDate - StartDate)-TRUNC(EndDate - StartDate)) * 24)) * 60) as "minutes" FROM ( SELECT sysdate as StartDate, TO_DATE(auc_endDate,'rrrr-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as EndDate FROM AUCTION WHERE auc_no = #{auc_no} )
